description:
Bullet Hell Artistry #5: Unbelievable Allies
Create a dual boss script featuring a canon Touhou character and a character from any game.

Backstory

It was a nice and normal day at the Hakurei Shrine, Reimu is sweeping the shrine as usual.  A huge purple cube fell down from the skies, right on her shrine. Destroying her shrine in the process. She got angered so she contacted Yukari about it, Yukari seems to be missing. And then Yukari came, holding a gun and a pickaxe in her hands. "What's going on?", "Reimu, it seems like there's a disturbance in Gensokyo. Mysterious people started to show up in these portals.", "What can we do now?" Yukari held her at gunpoint "I guess this is what outside worlders call it 'Battle Royale'." She starts shooting Reimu, Reimu escaped, realizing how the others are already affected by the Incident. Entitled "Battle Royale Incident", it caused all youkai and humans to kill each other till there's one left and return and repeat the cycle over and over. Reimu got angered by this so she started to explore thoroughly. In her exploration, she met a mysterious foundation that tasks to help on the culprit. Same as she would do so.

A short Touhou script with guns, use these guns to speedkill your opponents.

Update : Fixed a small bug when exiting, removing leftover assets
Update 2 : Added Novice mode
